hero.title: Precision Fasteners
hero.description: From high-tensile bolts to micro screws, we export premium industrial fasteners to 50+ countries. ISO certified quality, competitive pricing.

productsSection.description: Browse our comprehensive catalog of precision-engineered fasteners manufactured to international standards.

header.title: Built on Quality
header.description: 25+ years of expertise in manufacturing and exporting industrial fasteners to global markets.

features.title: ISO Certified Quality
features.description: All products meet ISO 9001:2015 standards with full traceability and quality documentation.

features.title: Direct Manufacturing
features.description: Vertically integrated production ensures competitive pricing and consistent quality control.

features.title: Global Logistics
features.description: Door-to-door delivery to 50+ countries with real-time tracking and customs clearance support.

features.title: Industry Standards
features.description: DIN, ANSI, JIS, and custom specifications. We speak your industry's language.

features.title: Technical Support
features.description: Engineering team available for product selection, custom solutions, and technical queries.

features.title: Sustainable Practices
features.description: Eco-friendly manufacturing with recyclable materials and carbon-neutral shipping options.

testimonials.quote: Eltra Overseas has been our trusted supplier for over 10 years. Their quality and reliability are unmatched in the industry.
testimonials.author: Michael Chen

testimonials.quote: The technical support team helped us find the perfect fastener solution for our aerospace application. Outstanding expertise.
testimonials.author: Sarah Johnson

testimonials.quote: Fast shipping, competitive pricing, and consistent quality. They've streamlined our entire supply chain.
testimonials.author: Rajesh Patel

vlogsSection.title: See Eltra Overseas in Action
vlogsSection.description: Follow the team through testing labs, packing bays, and logistics control rooms. Each vlog keeps customers updated on the real processes behind their orders.

header.title: Tell us about your next shipment
header.description: Share specs, target markets, or compliance requirements and the Eltra Overseas team will revert with documentation plus pricing.

form.messagePlaceholder: Share product grades, destinations, or certifications needed

footer.description: Your trusted global partner for premium industrial fasteners. Quality engineering, competitive pricing, worldwide delivery.

gallery.caption: High-tensile bolts exiting the heat-treatment line

hex-bolts.name: Hex Bolts
hex-bolts.summary: High-tensile hexagonal head bolts machined for structural and heavy-equipment assemblies.
hex-bolts.description: Our hex bolts are CNC-machined from alloy steel and stainless steel billets, heat-treated for consistent tensile strength, and finished with hot-dip galvanizing or zinc-nickel plating. Every lot is batch-tested for proof load, head soundness, and thread accuracy before export.

machine-screws.name: Machine Screws
machine-screws.summary: Precision screws with tight tolerance threads for enclosures, switchgear, and electronics.
machine-screws.description: Eltra Overseas machine screws are roll-threaded for superior fatigue strength and supplied with multiple recess styles. Options include black oxide, zinc, nickel, and DLC coatings to match corrosion or cosmetic requirements.

nuts-washers.name: Nuts & Washers
nuts-washers.summary: Complete pairing hardware including nyloc nuts, castle nuts, flat and spring washers.
nuts-washers.description: Each nut and washer is manufactured with controlled hardness to prevent galling and to maintain clamp load. Options include prevailing torque lock nuts, flange nuts, and Belleville washers for vibration-prone assemblies.

self-tapping-screws.name: Self-Tapping Screws
self-tapping-screws.specs: ST2 - ST10 | Pan / CSK / Hex Washer
self-tapping-screws.summary: Self-drilling and tapping screws optimized for steel decks, composites, and plastics.
self-tapping-screws.description: Engineered drill points and case-hardened bodies enable quick penetration with minimal burr. Available with Ruspert, Geomet, and polymer top coats for 1000+ hour salt spray protection.

anchors.name: Anchors
anchors.summary: Anchoring solutions for concrete, masonry, and hollow blocks with tested pull-out values.
anchors.description: We supply mechanical as well as chemical anchor systems complete with ETA assessments. Each anchor is proof-tested and delivered with torque charts, making them job-site ready.

specialty-fasteners.name: Specialty Fasteners
specialty-fasteners.summary: Special-form fasteners including captive screws, double-end studs, and bespoke hardware.
specialty-fasteners.description: For builds that demand non-standard geometries, Eltra Overseas machines parts directly from 3D models or drawings. Capabilities include multi-axis turning, thread rolling, secondary operations, and bespoke packaging.

precision-fastening-lab-tour.title: Inside The Precision Fastening Lab
precision-fastening-lab-tour.summary: Walk through our torque testing zone and see how each batch of bolts gets validated before export.
precision-fastening-lab-tour.description: Join the Eltra Overseas quality engineers for an in-depth look at our lab instrumentation. We cover tensile testing, salt spray simulations, and the digital traceability workflow that keeps every fastener batch audit-ready.

global-shipping-network-overview.title: How We Ship Fasteners To 50+ Countries
global-shipping-network-overview.summary: Operations lead Neeraj explains how we consolidate orders, pack for corrosion protection, and dispatch worldwide.
global-shipping-network-overview.description: From booking containers to lining each crate with VCI protection sheets, this vlog shows how Eltra Overseas keeps deliveries fast and flawless. Learn about our preferred ports, inspection checkpoints, and logistics partners.

seed-example.name: Sample Buyer
seed-example.message: Interested in M16 bolts for automotive program.
